replies.body:
I care more about this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GoYjiKxpjzQ&index=40&list=LLMrejCxwkOWysM7_jEU84fg

# spam

But NONE of it was done in Ranked games. Those stats are literally next-to-worthless. I mean, k gratz for the Emote and Loading Border but you certainly haven't actually 'Mastered' those champions at all. You haven't tested yourself at all. This really just tells me that you have a lot of time on your hands.

It's my personal opinion that Normal games shouldn't even count toward Champion Mastery AND CASES LIKE THESE ARE WHY.

I really don't give two f*cks if someone has 50k Mastery Points if they're Bronze V.

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-22T13:43:36.887+0000)
>
> But NONE of it was done in Ranked games. Those stats are literally next-to-worthless. I mean, k gratz for the Emote and Loading Border but you certainly haven't actually 'Mastered' those champions at all. You haven't tested yourself at all. This really just tells me that you have a lot of time on your hands.
> 
> It's my personal opinion that Normal games shouldn't even count toward Champion Mastery AND CASES LIKE THESE ARE WHY.
> 
> I really don't give two f*cks if someone has 50k Mastery Points if they're Bronze V.

Then you look at his OP.GG and see that he is playing against plats and golds (and occasionally diamonds) in normals.
Gee I guess he must be a plat standard player then

> [{quoted}](name=Corki did 911,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2015-05-22T14:02:26.074+0000)
>
> Gee I guess he must be a plat standard player then

It's funny how you can't even win games at mid plat MMR.
It's funny how you can't even play games at mid plat MMR

*Occasionally

*Singular in most cases (i.e. Playing against 1 gold/plat in any given game, often with a plat/gold player on his team to balance it out)

Also, Plat+ just mess around in Normals 90% of the time or are 1st timing/learning champions.

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-22T13:43:36.887+0000)
>
> But NONE of it was done in Ranked games. Those stats are literally next-to-worthless. I mean, k gratz for the Emote and Loading Border but you certainly haven't actually 'Mastered' those champions at all. You haven't tested yourself at all. This really just tells me that you have a lot of time on your hands.
> 
> It's my personal opinion that Normal games shouldn't even count toward Champion Mastery AND CASES LIKE THESE ARE WHY.
> 
> I really don't give two f*cks if someone has 50k Mastery Points if they're Bronze V.

You're so uneducated it's funny. My normal MMR is higher than your ranked MMR, I've had diamonds and masters in my games often, I main Kalista and Jinx so don't tell me i haven't mastered them. I'd drop you in game right now kiddo.

Whats with the downvotes?
Its just a pic of 3 lvl 5's?

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-22T14:26:32.932+0000)
>
> Whats with the downvotes?
> Its just a pic of 3 lvl 5's?

People like downvoting me, it's all gucci. I love it.

lol then why did I get a down vote?
Guys plz what the hell.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=000500000001,timestamp=2015-05-22T14:50:48.455+0000)
>
> lol then why did I get a down vote?
> Guys plz what the hell.

You didn't...

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2015-05-22T14:27:19.733+0000)
>
> People like downvoting me, it's all gucci. I love it.

is that because of bipolarism?
So for all this time you ONLY played one role and ONLY with three champs?

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-22T13:22:59.856+0000)
>
> So for all this time you ONLY played one role and ONLY with three champs?

I main ADC, it was nice to learn the new ashe, I love kalista in jinx so they came naturally while IP farming.

Huh. Still, it's pretty impressive.
In just a few games i happened to not always be able to get support and had to play jungle or adcs or whatever, and yet you got adcs all the time :P

> [{quoted}](name=Ediwir,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7xJT2LzX,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-22T23:47:11.737+0000)
>
> Huh. Still, it's pretty impressive.
> In just a few games i happened to not always be able to get support and had to play jungle or adcs or whatever, and yet you got adcs all the time :P

I play them top or botlane, I think I did a jungle kalista game once to, got wrecked hard.

LOL.
Ok, that explains it :P
That's sick! Congrats :)
Now you have to wait untill tomorrow for CM bug fix.
Best bronze AD carry OCE grats dude
